alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of , the northeastern City of Chesapeake and the City of Virginia Beach through 400 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fentress, or near Great Bridge, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Virginia Beach, Regent University, Great Bridge, Kempsville, Chesapeake, Back Bay, Fentress, Princess Anne, Rudee Heights, Mount Pleasant, Sigma, Sandbridge Beach, Oceana NAS, Macons Corner, Pungo, Greenbrier, Oceana, Dam Neck, Gallups Corner and Hickory. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
